data.oai_dc:dc: Avian Community Composition of primary and logged forest, Sabah Borneo - PDF

Data originally collected in the field (see Edwards et al. 2013, doi: 10.1111/cobi.12059) and published previously in Edwards et al. (2013) supplementary information. Data represent species identity and abundance for all bird species originally recorded in Edwards et al. (2013). (PDF format)
